reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Low Quality Camera, and poor picture
reviews.reviewText: While I like the slim/compact design, it's HD and FULL HD video quality is poor (grainy). I could not get any type of SD Card (tried various types ie.. Micro: SD TF, SDXC, SDUC, SDHC, ProPlus. The plug is in a very bad spot, which makes it hard to place without the cord causing issues. Also, there is no way to turn off all the internal lights, which make this camera easy to spot in any room setting. Would not recommend anyone purchase this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Do not buy!
reviews.reviewText: Most products from China that are sold through Amazon are really faulty. That's just my experience and so whenever I shop for something, I try to avoid that country as much as possible but sometimes, things fall through the cracks like this little bugger.You see a small camera, reasonably priced, seemingly easy set up = no brainer. Except it doesn't work. Here's what I have. Easy-enough to read English instructions with a small pictorial demonstration below, the QR code to dl the app, stand, cam and cord. All seems to be correct except, it doesn't work.So, I urge you to avoid this and spend the extra bucks on an actual camera.
